Description: Creates a Dashboard to monitor a Lambda@Edge function.

FunctionName.Description: The name of the lambda function you wish to monitor eg. "testLambdaPlsIgnore"

FunctionVersion.Description: The version of the function you wish to monitor eg. "3"

DashboardName.Description: The name of the CloudWatch dashboard that will be created. It is recommended to incorporate the Lambda's name and version to avoid aliasing. eg. "testLambdaPlsIgnore-v3"
DashboardName.ConstraintDescription: Valid characters in dashboard names are "0-9A-Za-z-_"

DashboardBody.Fn::Sub: {"widgets":[{"type":"text","x":0,"y":0,"width":24,"height":1,"properties":{"markdown":"# US East (N. Virginia) - us-east-1"}},{"type":"metric","x":12,"y":2,"width":12,"height":6,"properties":{"metrics":[["AWS/Lambda","Duration","FunctionName","us-east-1.${FunctionName}","Resource","us-east-1.${FunctionName}:${FunctionVersion}",{"stat":"Average","period":300}],["...",{"stat":"Maximum","period":300}]],"view":"timeSeries","stacked":false,"region":"us-east-1","title":"Duration","period":300}},{"type":"metric","x":0,"y":2,"width":12,"height":6,"properties":{"metrics":[["AWS/Lambda","Invocations","FunctionName","us-east-1.${FunctionName}","Resource","us-east-1.${FunctionName}:${FunctionVersion}",{"stat":"Sum"}]],"view":"timeSeries","stacked":false,"region":"us-east-1","title":"Invocations","period":300}},{"type":"metric","x":0,"y":8,"width":12,"height":6,"properties":{"metrics":[["AWS/Lambda","Errors","FunctionName","us-east-1.${FunctionName}","Resource","us-east-1.${FunctionName}:${FunctionVersion}",{"id":"errors","stat":"Sum"}],[".","Invocations",".",".",".",".",{"id":"invocations","stat":"Sum","visible":false}],[{"expression":"100 -
